app.title: Regex Batch Renamer
app.subtitle: Powerful Batch File Renaming Tool
app.description: A modern and intuitive batch file renaming tool with regex support and real-time preview.

hero.headline: Rename Files Faster Than Ever
hero.subheadline: Powerful regex-based batch renaming with real-time preview

features.title: Why Regex Batch Renamer?
features.subtitle: Stop wasting time on manual file organization

batch.title: Tame the Chaos
batch.description: Turn hours of manual renaming into seconds. Use standard Regex or simple wildcards to organize thousands of files instantly.

preview.title: Confidence in Every Click
preview.description: Live diff preview shows exactly what will change. Catch mistakes before they happen with our real-time comparison engine.

opensource.title: Open Source & Privacy First
opensource.description: 100% Free, MIT Licensed, and Offline-capable. Your files never leave your device. No tracking, no paywalls.

download.title: Download
download.description: Available for macOS, Windows, and Linux
